title: Natural ingredients prove effective for arthritis relief
author: Interim HealthCare
description: Arthritis treatment research and science has been advancing rapidly.
cleaned_text: Arthritis treatment research and science has been advancing rapidly. New drugs target certain aspects of the disease, while joint replacement surgeries are becoming more commonplace and sophisticated than ever before. But sometimes, the best treatment can come from nature, ABC News reports. According to certain integrative medicine physicians, some dietary ingredients can target some of the painful aspects of this disease. Dr. Ashwin Mehta, medical director of integrative medicine at the University of Miami's Miller School of Medicine, told the news outlet that it is easy for older adutls to incorporate certain foods with anti-inflammatory properties into their diets. "Ginger and tumeric are powerful anti-inflammatory ingredients we can recommend pretty much to anybody," he told the news outlet. "They are very safe and have no potential medication interactions or complications." The news source adds that garlic, cinnamon and soy have also been found to have these properties. Eating plenty of omega-3 fatty acids from walnuts, fatty fish and flax seeds may also help because they decrease the production of enzymes that spread imflammation, Lifescript.com reports.
